title: Ticket #1691: Gridmanager should use DelegatedProxyExpiration for cream jobs
description:
The gridmanager uses job attribute DelegatedProxyExpiration to avoid refreshing proxies to all gram2 jobs on restart. Without this attribute, on restart, the gridmanager doesn't know when the previously-delegated proxy will expire. Refreshing proxies for all jobs is an expensive operation to be avoided if possible.

With Cream, there's only one proxy delegated for many jobs, so refreshing it is inexpensive for the gridmanager. But it's very expensive on the Cream side when it has to push the proxy out to hundreds or thousands of jobs. Thus, the gridmanager should use the DelegatedProxyExpiration attribute for Cream jobs to avoid unnecessary proxy refreshes on a restart.
